sn35.125:3.1: 125 In the Land of the Vajjians
sn35.125:4.1: At one time the Buddha was staying in the land of the Vajjians at the village of Hatthi.
sn35.125:4.2: Then the householder Ugga of Hatthi went up to the Buddha,
sn35.125:4.5: “What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why some sentient beings aren’t fully extinguished in the present life?
sn35.125:4.6: What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why some sentient beings are fully extinguished in the present life?” …
sn35.125:4.7: (This should be told in full as in the previous discourse.)
